django.contrib.gis.geos.libgeos
===============================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.gis.geos.libgeos

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   This module houses the ctypes initialization procedures, as well
   as the notice and error handler function callbacks (get called
   when an error occurs in GEOS).

   This module also houses GEOS Pointer utilities, including
   get_pointer_arr(), and GEOM_PTR.



Attributes
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.gis.geos.libgeos.logger
   django.contrib.gis.geos.libgeos.NOTICEFUNC

   django.contrib.gis.geos.libgeos.PREPGEOM_PTR

   django.contrib.gis.geos.libgeos.CONTEXT_PTR
   django.contrib.gis.geos.libgeos.lgeos

.. py:function:: geos_version()

   Return the string version of the GEOS library.


.. py:function:: geos_version_tuple()

   Return the GEOS version as a tuple (major, minor, subminor).
